title: 63 - Steven's Tuxedo
description: Quit your job, get a spiral notebook, and listen to this week's My Favorite Murder. Karen and Georgia cover the crimes of the demonic Joseph Edward Duncan III and the Coen Brothers-esque Fred Neulander.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
